titles: Warnings to the unclean in a discourse from Rev. XXI. 8. Preacht at Springfield lecture, August 25th. 1698. At the execution of Sarah Smith. By Mr. John Williams pastor of the Church at Deerfield.
author: Williams, John, 1664-1729.
publisher: printed by B. Green, and J. Allen, for Michael Perry, at his shop over-against the Town-House,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
